text: We may disclose your information only with your consent to any party you choose to, which we may obtain in a number of ways, in our communications with you.

Additionally, Company may use your information to:
Company may use your information in furtherance of our legitimate interests in operating our Site, Services and business.
In order for us to provide and maintain our Site and Services, and to improve your user experience, we will use your information in accordance with your instructions, including any applicable terms in your Customer Agreement and applicable law.
Our Site offers you the functionality of using your social media credentials (e.g. Facebook, Google, etc.) to use single-sign-on to enter our Site, and in that manner, we may also collect certain information from you as you log on and as limited by such third parties sources.
We may disclose your information only with your consent to any party you choose to, which we may obtain in a number of ways, in our communications with you.

From time to time, we may use Google Analytics, AdWords and/or AdSense tracking codes, along with other third party software tools (such as remarketing codes) in order to collect marketing analytics about the pages you browse on our Site or when you undertake specific actions through our services.
Our third party vendors may also use cookies and beacons to track your Internet browsing in order to serve you ads based on what they or us believe to be of your interest.
Either we or our affiliates and authorized service providers may also use 'beacons', which are small files, sometimes only a pixel in size, embedded onto the pages of our Site.

Your Responsibility Company uses industry standard protocols and technology to protect user data and use encryption for any data transmissions as much as possible to prevent data theft by unauthorized third parties.
